_id.description: Unique identifier for the note, generated using the counters collection

content.description: Content of the note, may be encrypted if encrypt flag is used

tags.description: List of tags associated with the note for categorization and triggering agents

workspace.description: Workspace to which the note belongs, defaults to 'default'

encrypted.description: Indicates whether the content is encrypted

created_at.description: Timestamp when the note was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the note was last updated
